Cleveland ,
OH. Seafood Place | 1 Of 5 | Previous | Next | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 Question # 304074: Seafood Place Starting a(n) Restaurant Home-Based
with
Helpers.
DeJohn Doestch Royal
ZYXCo. Start my own Cuyahoga County Restaurant business.
Where to get a Cleveland Home-Based business plan template. How do I protect my Restaurant small business?
Ohio 44105
Starting a OH Restaurant business. Cleveland Cuyahoga County , OH 44105. Get Started
# 304074 : In Cleveland, Ohio, Here's What Restaurant Licensing You Need in Cleveland for your
Home-Based 44105 Business.
Required Business Licenses&Tax IDs VIDEO: Frequently Asked Questions
Start my own business.
Answer: Click on tabs 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 for more information. ______________________________________________ Business License Seller's Permit DBA Biz Name Tax ID Number
LLC / Corporation
You Need a Business License
Starting businesses in the city of Cleveland need to register a(n), OH business permit. Factors a business license is based are
Home-Based type of business, number of employees, gross income, and or location. E.g., you start a Restaurant business. You will need a businesss license because even home based businesses need a business license and or a home occupation permit.
Getting a business license is required for Home-Based Restaurant businesses.
If your services or products and it includes touchable objects, you will need to obtain a Seller's Permit to use it to buy your merchandise tax exempt.
Also, note that businesses using a company name in Cuyahoga County need to get a(n) DBA Doing Business As Trade Name Registration.
You May Need To Get A Seller's Permit A business license and a DBA is ncessary for most businesses but if your business sells any taxable items, you will need a sales tax ID number. Seller's Permit (A.K.A Ohio seller's permit, seller's license, state id, wholesale, resale, reseller certificate).
If you provide Restaurant services or products and it includes touchable objects, you will need to obtain a Seller's Permit to use it to buy your merchandise tax exempt.
You May Need To Apply For a Fictitious Business Name Regisration
Starting your own Restaurant businesses using a company name in Cuyahoga County need to get a(n) DBA Doing Business As Trade Name Registration. For example, your are a home based business doing busines as your website domain name "www.AA Restaurant Merchant. com ". The domain name must be registered as a DBA Doing Business As Name or if you are using another trade name that one you will need to file as well..
If you are thinking of hiring help, you will need a state employer ID and an IRS number employer ID. I.e., a OH Federal Tax Id Number and a(n) OH State Employer Tax Number Note that there are two state tax IDs: a state employer tax ID (EIN) and a sales tax ID ( seller's permit).
Instead of filing a fictitious business name DBA Filing in Cleveland, Incorporate in OH or form a(n) OH LLC Most likely, you will need to file a trade name certificate. If you incorporate or form an LLC, you don't need to get a trade name unless the LLC or Corporation Name is different from the trade name. So, for example, your LLC is called "XYZ" LLC but you do business as "Electronics Discount Haven". You will need to file a fictitious business name under the LLC for that DBA name. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Instead of filing a Cuyahoga County fictitious business name (our service fee includes dba business name filing and legal paper publication) you can elect to incorporate in Ohio or form an OH LLC (starts @ $199 for most states&includes bylaws and LLC operating agreement)..
If you do form an Home-Based llc or incorporate your Restaurant business instead of just filing a fictitious business name (dba), it will help you avoid legal and financial personal liability arising out of business transactions and you will not have to register the Cleveland business name. If you employ workers, you will need a federal EIN and a State EIN tax ID number. Note that there are 3 tax ID numbers: A federal tax ID number, a state employer tax ID number and a sales tax ID number ( seller's permit).
Partnerships, corporations and llcs are required to get a federal tax Id number in addition to other tax ids above. Click on the tabs ( 1,2,3,4,and 5, above ) for more information or take this easy and quick quiz ( about 3 minutes) to find out what exactly is required for your business. Click below to take the quiz. 44105,
Get Started

Description Starting a restaurant business is perhaps a good idea because most people today want to eat out or take food home. Even though we have about 1,000,000 food service establishments as of 2012, there may still be some opportunity out there. Most consumers want to have a fast and tasty meal, quickly. That makes the to go food industry more attractive but some say, even despite that, the restaurant business is not the easiest to make a lot of money. If you can provide real good food and service coupled with great people to serve it, as well as a good a simple operation, you may have a good chance of succeeding in this business. However, if you don’t know about serving or cooking food, a restaurant may not be for you. But who your clients are going to be? Those from 15 to 25 year old eat out and usually they eat to go or fast foods. So a fast food restaurant may be a good idea to target them. The 25 to 45 crowd likes a more gourmet but yet fast type of service. So a regular, not so formal restaurant may be ok If you want to cater to this group. To serve the crowd from 45 and above, you may want to have an upscale restaurant and or a family upscale restaurant. Finally, keep everything clean, smelling well and elegant and you may be able to make some money operating a restaurant.
